'''''Plug-and-Play Plan''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A band of rogues has appeared out in the wild, threatening the safety of the surrounding area. Head over there and take them out. Who knows &mdash; you might make wonderous use out of the nearby [[Thunder Sakura Bough]]s and [[Nimbus Gem]]s.}}
# Complete Time Trial Challenge
#* Opponents Defeated: 0/X<!--displayed after starting the challenge-->
#: The higher the number of connections, the stronger the buffs

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}

==Gameplay Notes==
Enemies for each variant of the commission:

===Seirai Island===
; Northwest [[Seirai Island]] (near the teleport waypoint north of [["Seiraimaru"]])
: Defeat 10 opponents in 3:00 mins
:; Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Electro Samachurl;Anemo Specter;Crackling Axe Mitachurl}}
:; Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Pyro Hilichurl Shooter;Cryo Hilichurl Shooter;Crackling Axe Mitachurl;Hydro Specter}}
:; Wave 3 {{Enemy List|Geo Specter*2;Electro Abyss Mage}}

===Tsurumi Island===
; North [[Tsurumi Island]] (East of [[Shirikoro Peak]])
: Defeat 4 opponents in 5:00 mins
:; Wave 1
:: {{Enemy|Ruin Defender|x=2}}
:; Wave 2
:: {{Enemy|Ruin Cruiser|x=2}}

===Watatsumi Island===
; East [[Watatsumi Island]] (Southeast of [[Suigetsu Pool]], slightly above the teleport waypoint):
: Defeat 5 opponents in 3:00 mins
:; Wave 1
:: {{Enemy|Nobushi: Jintouban|x=2}}
:; Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}

; Southeast [[Watatsumi Island]] (upstream of the waterfalls east of [[Bourou Village]])
: Defeat 10 opponents in 3:00 mins
:; Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard*4;Hydro Specter}}
:; Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Berserker*2;Electro Hilichurl Grenadier;Hilichurl Grenadier;Anemo Specter}}
